info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:17PM CDT until July 18 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR WESTERN STONE...EASTERN SEARCY...SOUTHWESTERN IZARD... SOUTHEASTERN MARION AND SOUTHEASTERN BAXTER COUNTIES... At 617 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Culp, or 15 miles northwest of Mountain View, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Calico Rock... Norfork... Salesville... Thola... Brandenberg... Shipp... Lone Star... Herron... Maumee... Herpel... Advance... Cartney... Culp... Elberta... Blanchard Springs Campground... Leslie... Big Flat... Allison... Alco... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
